text: 3:9 Aisaia 43:4; 45:14; 49:23; 60:14; Akar Mogomem 2:9Ia Satanɨn adarazigh fo, me kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, me Judan adarasi. Egha me Judan adarazi puvatɨ, me ifavarir gumazamiziba. Ia orakigh. Kɨ gumazamizir kabar amightɨ me izɨ ian suebar apengan teviba apɨrigh, egh me kamaghɨn fogham, kɨ bar ia gifonge.
